posts.title: Cycle
posts.body: Hashtag Electric has 250W BLDC Hub Motor with 45 Nm torque. This powerful yet noiseless motor will give you thrilling experience.

posts.title: Laptop
posts.body: MacBook Air with M1 is an incredibly portable laptop — it’s nimble and quick, with a silent, fanless design and a beautiful Retina display.

posts.title: Table Fan
posts.body: Aerodynamically designed blades with a sweep size of 400 mm;Offers air delivery of 65-73 cubic metres per minute (CMM).

posts.title: Moble Phone
posts.body: 6.1-inch (15.5 cm diagonal) Super Retina XDR display Ceramic Shield tougher than any smartphone glass.A14 Bionic chip, the fastest chip ever in a smartphone.

posts.title: Washing Machine
posts.body: With features that ensure a great wash every time, this IFB Front Load Washing Machine lets you relax while enjoying a fantastic washing session.
